definition: the organized action of making of goods and services for sale, make up something artificial or untrue
details:
noun
- the organized action of making of goods and services for sale
= synonyms: industry
- the act of making something (a product) from raw materials
= synonyms: fabrication
verb
- make up something artificial or untrue
= synonyms: make up, invent, fabricate, cook up
- put together out of artificial or natural components or parts
= synonyms: construct, fabricate
- create or produce in a mechanical way
- produce naturally
= example: produce naturally
